comment: She is disorganized and is never clear with anything. She gives way too much homework to the point where you are basically getting 1-3 hours of sleep each day. She also gives way too many tests but never teaches much. She also screams a lot.

There is SO much homework!! But she's very lenient on accepting it late. There were 3 tests and they were all pretty easy and I got A's on all of them. The oral presentations were graded very leniently as well. However, she is very disorganized and boring, so I wouldn't recommend her nor take her again.

This class was a struggle for me. I took two semesters of Spanish in high school so i thought I'd do well but that wasn't the case. If it weren't for the homework i doubt i would've passed. The test where pretty difficult, and  when it came down to the oral presentations she was very lenient.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Makes you do a LOT of online homework, but its not too hard. The biggest issue was that she absolutely requires that you participate and speak in class. I have a stutter/anxiety and so that made this class absolutely awful, but i may be a unique case. The professor herself is very nice and extremely helpful.

Although she is a nice person, she did not put a single grade in d2l until the day of the exam. She is very disorganized and does not explain things well. She was late to class a lot and it seemed like she just taught whatever came to mind. Take her if Spanish is easy for you, but if not then stay away.

Mrs.Hinckley is an overall easy class. She assigns TONS of hw after each class that is busy work.  Other than that you only have 2 tests and 2-3 presentations. However, she is a complete pain  to deal with. The majority of our class dreaded coming to class as well.

Great teacher! She was clear and had great sense of humor. She pushed me to study vocabulary since we had several pop quizzes.She assigned a lot of homework but it was helpful. Knows a lot about Hispanic culture, well, she's Hispanic. I enjoyed her class she was funny  and I feel prepared for Span 1002.
She gave a lot of homework, but gives good grades. Thought I was failing but did some extra credit assignments and she gave me a B.

Don't take this professor!! This was by far the worst professor I have had in Kennesaw. She is never clear with anything she says and and is extremely unorganized. She's not even easy to make matters worse! She will say one thing and do another completely throwing the class off. Whether you care for spanish or not don't take her.

She's nice enough but assigns homework over breaks w/o letting the class know. If there are legit technical difficulties, she won't open the homework back up. she doesn't even know how to work her own required website. if you don't won't 40 assignments twice a week, don't take this class.
